name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Harley D. CLEMENT, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and SAYLOR, JJ.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Harley D. CLEMENT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of November, 2000, the order of the Superior Court is AFFIRMED. Erie v. Pap’s A.M. t/d/b/a/ Kandyland, 529 U.S. 277, 120 S.Ct. 1382, 146 L.Ed.2d 265 (2000).
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lawrence J. Casella, Pittsburgh, for H. Clement.
Gerald J. Pappert, John G. Knorr, Harrisburg, for Com. of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
761 A.2d 545
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Harley D. CLEMENT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 11, 2000.
Decided Nov. 27, 2000.
Lawrence J. Casella, Pittsburgh, for H. Clement.
Gerald J. Pappert, John G. Knorr, Harrisburg, for Com. of Pennsylvania.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and SAYLOR, JJ.
